bibl.title: Roman Military Diplomas, Epistulae and Papyrological Evidence.
Proceedings of the 20th International Congress of Papyrologists
bibl.author: MIRKOVIC, Mira

bibl.note: A useful complement to C.I.L. XVI Appendix would be: A. P. Clermont-Ganneau (= S.B. VI, 9228); - B. P. Osl. Inv. 1518 (= S.B. XVI, 12508). Both documents concern soldiers who had served in auxiliary units in Egypt.
MIRKOVIC Mira, Roman Military Diplomas, Epistulae and Papyrological Evidence.
Proceedings of the 20th International Congress of Papyrologists (Copenhagen, 1994) pp. 452-455.
